item.title: Kony ▼ 2012
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:8, topic:435445”]Firstly the definition of infamous is.

  1. Well known for some bad quality or deed

  2. Wicked; abominable

  3. (of a person) Deprived of all or some citizens’ rights as a consequence of conviction for a serious crime

Secondly the video says to make him “Famous”.

Last but not least both words work out.

[quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=538165.msg3937634#msg3937634 date=1331162061]
Who gives a fuck, this has been going on for years now and wont stop just because you try to “spread the word”. even if they do catch him there will all ways be another child predator/rapist/serial killer out there that will take the place of the last.
[/quote]This isn’t just about spreading the word.[/quote]
video says Famous. so i still win this argument.

Read full topic

item.title: Kony ▼ 2012
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:6, topic:435445”][quote author=hat trix link=topic=538165.msg3937344#msg3937344 date=1331149352]

Infamous*

Also, the United States should take care of their own problems before trying to fix ANY other entity’s.

Besides, if the rest of the world stopped supporting Africa, two things would happen.

  1. The entire continent would fall into a state of disarray, eventually consuming itself with war (nuke it from orbit, just to be sure)
  2. They learn to take care of their own problems, like every other government learned to

I would be content with either.

I have to side with zyle on this. although i didn’t watch all 29 minutes of the video, from what i heard he is kidnapping children, ect.
so wouldn’t you want to make him infamous?
[/quote]
Hes infamous right now… thats why no one knows him… WATCH THE VIDEO!!!

to make someone visable you make them famous
to make someone Invisable you make them Infamous and unknown.[/quote]

no. you are wrong, friend.

infamous - Well known for some bad quality or deed.

basically the same thing as famous, but being famous for something bad.

edit: damnit zupper quit beating me to posts!

Read full topic
